page.title: 10Leisure Activities
page.content: (Continued from page 9) The Memorial Hall houses a variety of activies,one of the few for women is "Keep Fit". Also held at the Memorial Hall is Mayfield's W.I. which meets once a month. The Senior Social Club meet at the Memorial Hall too. This is a thriving club for the over sixties. They play Bingo,listen to visiting speakers,enjoy refreshments and organised outings. However in this area if they want to swim, play tennis,squash or go to a disco the people would have to travel to Ashbourne, only two miles along the A 52.
